subject: Philosophy
title: Radical Freedom
description: A micro-lesson that makes Radical Freedom usable.

hook.text: Sartre said you're free even in chains. The prisoner chooses how to face captivity.

buildup.text: For Sartre, freedom isn't about options. It's about the inescapable fact that you choose your response.

discovery.text: Even refusing to choose is a choice. You cannot escape freedom â€” it's built into being human.

twist.text: This radical freedom terrified Sartre. He called it 'condemnation' â€” you are condemned to be free.

climax.text: There's no script, no fate, no human nature to fall back on. Just you and your next decision.

punchline.text: You are condemned to be free.
